titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against income tax for employers which provide onsite day care services for dependents of their employees.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/25/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax credit to employers for the expenses of establishing an on-site dependent care facility. Sets the amount of such credit at 35 percent of the aggregate net qualified dependent care expenses.
